channel.title: Flame
channel.description: Well, I've been reading over some topics and every single one is just entirely full of people flaming each other. "ITS NOT CODING ITZ PROGRAMMIN". Really, don't flame just because they didn't use the word you prefer, I'm pretty sure you can use either word. People such as AMERIKA in particular start a [b]LOT[/b] of flaming while others just jump on the bandwagon and start flaming with them because they want to be cool. Well, guess what, flaming doesn't make you cool. Seriously, just stop. The same thing goes for trolling, there is no need for it and it just makes you look like even more of a wank. If you start flaming on this topic, I will report you and that will be the end of it.

item.title: Flame
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

There is no need to continue. If you guys have problems with each other, PMs work fine, but play nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Flame
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

AMERIKA:

If you have a problem then gtfo. No one here is going to nanny you.

Excuse me?

Yours

Date Registered: April 13, 2009, 01:37:03 am

Now go look at mine. I’m not here to flame and I’m not going to argue with you.

Read full topic

If you have a problem then gtfo. No one here is going to nanny you.
[/quote]

This is a community. Shit like this is bound to happen. We need people like Amerika flame. We need people like Cocoa to appose it. We need people like Aaron to back him up.[/quote]we need people like you to leave

item.title: Flame
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:4, topic:301281"][quote author=the1337legend link=topic=397588.msg2951528#msg2951528 date=1252538738]
We can’t get to know him if he hates everything he see’s because people like me don’t fit his perspectives in a “talk to, chat with person”

[/quote]

go on irc more often[/quote]

i usually go on once or twice for 10 min or so everytime i come to mscp.

irc gets boring when no one wants to talk
or when what they’re talking about doesn’t involve you :s

ohwell anyway
@topic as i’ve seen b4 (not exactly but meh);
Moparscape forums is the flaming forums, if you can’t handle it leave
idk exactly what it was, but meh.

peopl will always flame…
endof really ;/
can’t stop it unless you get rid of the freedom of speech aspect of life.

Read full topic

Not provoking flame, just saying, he hates me D:

uhmmm, jw, what do you mean by trolling? i’ve seen the term, just never really, seen it as much to know what it means.
